gui

Class Flexor

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.Flexor

  • public class Flexor
extends java.lang.Object
    Force-directed graph layout algorithm. Takes in a graph (with the nodes having no cartesian location) And attempts to place them in a way that is relatively untangled. See also: http://cs.brown.edu/~rt/gdhandbook/chapters/force-directed.pdf
    Author:
    MPatashnik
